title: Gamesplat and lost LP
body: I've had bugsplats afer changing resolution. The only way to resolve this is to uninstall and reinstall LoL client. I have been changing monitors and have lost 3 ranked games this week from bugsplat.

replies.body: Bugsplats are usually caused by outdated drivers and corrupt game files, but hardware could be an issue too.  The monitor could be a cause but it may also be a coincidence.  To rule out possibilities, I instead suggest going over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to tune up your PC and game.  The steps here should get you squared away.
Is there no way to regain my lost LP?
